### Average F

```{r}
plot_trend(pop$F_bar, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, ylab = "Average F")
```

### F-at-age

```{r}
mu_F <- pop$mu_F
names(mu_F)[names(mu_F) == "est"] <- "mu"
mu_F$mu[mu_F$mu == 1] <- NA
F <- merge(pop$F, mu_F, by = c("model", "year", "age", "is_proj"))
plot_trend(F, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, frame = ~age, ylab = "F") |> 
  add_lines(y = ~mu, linetype = I(2), showlegend = FALSE, name = "mu", line = list(width = 0.5)) 
```

